conbody.p: In tethering, you can control your camera through i.

uses libgphoto2libgphoto2 for tethering. Therefore, gphoto2gphoto2 must support your camera fully to do tethered shooting. For now, gphoto2 supports only a few cameras for tethered shooting. For more information see Projects :: libgphoto2 :: supported cameras.

ol.li: Plug your camera into your computer.
Press T to switch to the tethering view.
